lines.text: Machines are like broads, built to be had.
You get your cerebral ass off my monolith.
That's what you wanted me to see?
Well that's a whole lot of fun Shannon, yeah. Forty seven years old and I get to stand here and look at that pile of scrap.

Scrap. You got any more funny games you want to play? How about about juggling some hand grenades blindfolded huh? Want to run around in a field of Cosmoline? Want me to shine up the flag pole for you? "What did you do in the war Daddy?" Well, sonny I stood around with my two idiot friends staring at some obsolete equipment. All right kiddies we're going to to put the big toy back in the sand pile and we are going to work.
